transcript_en:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, I am Kusum speaking from IndiaMART headquarters, senior manager. Sir, you just called IndiaMART headquarters customer care, so I called you. Did you speak with your call manager Nidhi ji, sir?
Customer: Yes, I spoke, I spoke.
Executive: Meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 11 o'clock, sir?
Customer: Yes, for 11:30.
Executive: Okay, okay, actually, sir, you called IndiaMART customer care, so can I close the concern, sir? Your discussion is done with Nidhi ji?
Customer: Yes, yes, it's done, yes it's done.
Executive: If you have any other concerns, you can connect with me on this number or you can personally call Nidhi ji, okay? Also, when I close the ticket now, sir, you will receive feedback on your email, a request because please give your positive response there so that I can close the concern, sir.
Customer: Okay, will it come in the mail?
Executive: Yes, it will just be on your mail whether the discussion with your call manager happened or not, yes or no, so please give your positive response there, sir, okay?
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Also, I will set a reminder to call you tomorrow morning, okay?
Customer: 11:30, yes, yes, yes.
Executive: 11:30, right, okay sir, just give your positive response on the mail, I will get it done, okay?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir, okay, thank you sir.

issues.problem: Executive is asking for positive feedback before ensuring the issue is actually resolved.
issues.actionable_summary: IndiaMART should train executives to prioritize actual resolution over positive feedback requests and ensure the customer's issue is fully addressed before soliciting feedback.

upsell.upsell_reason: No clear indication of upsell opportunity in this call.

call_summary: The executive called the customer to confirm that their issue was resolved with the call manager Nidhi and to request a positive response on the feedback email that will be sent after the ticket is closed. The customer confirmed the resolution and agreed to provide positive feedback.

key_insights: Executive is focused on closing the ticket and getting positive feedback.
Customer seems agreeable but there is no actual problem discussed in the call.
llm_raw_response.original_summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about the call with Nidhi.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the meeting schedule.

- Executive requested positive feedback on mail.

- Executive set a reminder to call the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, feedback, call schedule
